name: Luiz Caldas
description: '''Luiz César Pereira Caldas''' (January 19, 1963) is a [[Brazilians|Brazilian]] [[singer]], [[songwriter]], multi-instrumentalist and music producer. He gained prominence in 1985 with the song ''{{Interlanguage link|Fricote|pt|Fricote}}'', which contributed to the popularization of axé music, and has been a notable figure in the [[Bahian Carnival|Salvador Carnival]].
